nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content: ## Timer starts the Update every 24 hours and Read the Links out of a Google Sheets File (RSS-Links)

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note1

parameters.content: ## Each individual link is scanned and retrieved

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note2

parameters.content: ## Everything older than 3 days is removed

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note3

parameters.content: ## Each entry is saved individually with a waiting time in the Google Sheets file (RSS-Feeds), the waiting time is necessary as Google Sheets would otherwise receive too many hits and block access!

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note4

parameters.content: ## Reading the saved entries in the Google Sheets file (RSS-Feeds)

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note5

parameters.content: ## Everything that is younger than 3 days will be removed, as we only want to delete the older entries!

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note6

parameters.content: ## All entries older than 3 days are deleted here, again with a timer to prevent a Google API block! (RSS-Feeds)

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Scheduletrigger Workflow

## Overview
Automated workflow: Scheduletrigger Workflow. This workflow integrates 10 different services: stickyNote, markdown, wait, code, scheduleTrigger. It contains 27 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 27
- **Node Types**: 10
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **Schedule Trigger**: scheduleTrigger
- **Edit Fields**: set
- **Code**: code
- **Markdown**: markdown
- **Loop Over Items**: splitInBatches
- **Wait**: wait
- **Loop Over Items1**: splitInBatches
- **RSS**: rssFeedRead
- **Code1**: code
- **Loop Over Items2**: splitInBatches
- ... and 17 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
